title: Serra Pelada 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC ANGELiC
description:
Friends and Julian Joachim leave Sao Paulo in search of the dream of gold. The year is 1980. The two arrive at the rainforest like so many thousands of men arrived. Full of dreams and illusions. But life in the camp changes everything. The obsession with wealth and power destroys. Julian becomes a gangster. Joaquim leaves all his assets back. A story about the gold rush, about greed and violence. About a great friendship and its end.
